de.dfki.embots.behaviorbuilder.view
Class Slider1d

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JSlider
                  de.dfki.embots.behaviorbuilder.view.Slider1d
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class Slider1d
extends javax.swing.JSlider

An enhanced JSlider allowing to manipulate 1-dimensional double precision values. Objects of this class offer their callers a convenient way to read and manipulate the underlying data by asking for (and delivering) "actual" values, so they do not have to care about the internal representation, Slider-wise, that is handled transparently in the background.

See Also:
Serialized Form

i2a

public double i2a(int internalValue)
Compute an actual (meant) value from its internal representation. The min and max values defined at construction time have to be used here.

Parameters:
internalValue - a value in the JSlider-compliant form
Returns:
the value translated to the actual form.

a2i

public int a2i(double actualValue)
Compute the internal representation of a value from its actual form.

Parameters:
actualValue - the actual value to be translated
Returns:
the value in a form to be used with JSlider operations
